If you're looking for a grind, vast gameplay variation, and a horror-themed experience, this game might be for you. 
If you can [b] tolerate [/b] occasional ping lag, community toxicity, bugs that go unfixed for sometimes years, and general frustration surrounding balance of all forms; this game is definitely for you. 
Graphics are alright, sound design is amazing, and loyalty to horror licenses is top-notch.

i liked the game a lot and it may be my favorite game but i get disconnected often. Just today, i got disconnected 4 times and my ban is now 24 hours. The first was 30 min, second was 1 hour, then 6 hours and now the 24 hour ban. My wifi was still working well and i was looking forward to playing the game. Wish they would at least reduce the ban time.

Its just an all around good game for what kind of genre it is. Nothing wrong with 4 people working together to open doors and escape the map. All this while a killer is running around trying to find you and stop you from fixing generators and taking out totems if the killer is using the perks for totems. Bad is some bugs some hackers and some times bad killers and bad people but only about 5% of the game is that. So 95% good so id say buy and play and enjoy!
